name: lihbr-apex
description: Source code of lihbr.com, my personal blog, you should check it out~
author: Lucie Haberer <hello@lihbr.com> (https://lihbr.com)

scripts.build:staging: npm run build && shx cp templates/noindex.robots.txt dist/robots.txt
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=Eleventy:Prismic* npm-run-all build:postcss --parallel dev:*
scripts.fonts:encrypt: tar --create --file src/_static/assets/fonts.tar src/_static/assets/fonts && openssl aes-256-cbc -e -salt -pass env:LIHBR_APEX -in src/_static/assets/fonts.tar -out src/_static/assets/fonts.tar.enc && rm src/_static/assets/fonts.tar
scripts.fonts:decrypt: openssl aes-256-cbc -d -salt -pass env:LIHBR_APEX -in src/_static/assets/fonts.tar.enc -out src/_static/assets/fonts.tar && tar --extract --file src/_static/assets/fonts.tar && rm src/_static/assets/fonts.tar
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run test && standard-version && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:alpha: npm run build && npm run test && standard-version --release-as major --prerelease alpha && git push --follow-tags
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
